name: Flagman (Itizso)
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.9.6a Details Title Flagman Model No. FL-02 Series Game & Watch ( Silver Series ) Manufacturer Nintendo Release Date June 5, 1980 Chipset Sharp SM5A ( 32.768 kHz ) Description

Flagman was the second title in the Silver Series of Game & Watch™ titles featuring improved graphic details and twice as many buttons as it's predecessor, Ball..

Gameplay

The gameplay in Flagman is rather different from that of the first game in the series. Here players had to rely on brain power rather than dexterity by repeating a given sequence of randomly displayed numbers from 1 to 4.

In Game A Flagman will show you a series of numbers using his hand and feet. You'll need to repeat the sequence of numbers, each within a given time limit. Get the sequence correct and Flagman will repeat the sequence with one new number added at the end and you'll have to repeat the sequence once more. Get a number incorrect in the sequence, or fail to enter a number within the time limit, and a miss is scored. Three misses and the game is over.

In Game B a random number between 1 and 4 will be displayed next to Flagman. You must depress the corresponding number within the time limit to move on to the next number. The time limit becomes shorter as your score increases. Get three numbers incorrect and the game is over.
